query.query_def: WITH SET org_members AS '{_param_1_}' SET time_members AS '{_param_2_}' MEMBER [Measures].[affected] AS 'COUNT(FILTER(NONEMPTYCROSSJOIN(NONEMPTYCROSSJOIN( {DESCENDANTS({org_members},[organization].[h].[store],SELF)},{_param_3_}),{time_members}), [Measures].[total_sample]> 0))/time_members.count', FORMAT_STRING = '#' MEMBER [Measures].[all] AS 'COUNT(CROSSJOIN(NONEMPTYCROSSJOIN(DESCENDANTS({org_members},[Organization].[h].[Store],SELF),{_param_3_}),{time_members}))/time_members.count', FORMAT_STRING = '#' MEMBER [Measures].[percentage] AS '([Measures].[affected]/[Measures].[all])', FORMAT_STRING = '0.00%' SELECT { [Measures].[affected], [Measures].[all], [Measures].[percentage] } ON COLUMNS FROM [op_plc_data]

WITH SET org_set AS '{_param_1_}' SET time_set AS '{_param_2_}' SET temps_set AS '{[op_plc_sensor].[sensor_id].&[30],[op_plc_sensor].[sensor_id].&[40],[op_plc_sensor].[sensor_id].&[41],[op_plc_sensor].[sensor_id].&[42]}' SET temps_mtrx_set AS '{[measures].[eficiency], [measures].[min_temp], [measures].[max_temp], [measures].[std_deviation]}' SET doors_set AS '{[op_plc_sensor].[sensor_id].&[71], [op_plc_sensor].[sensor_id].&[70]}'
MEMBER [time].[h].[TOTAL] AS 'SUM({time_set})' MEMBER [measures].[store_count] AS 'COUNT(FILTER(CROSSJOIN(CROSSJOIN(DESCENDANTS([Organization].[h].CurrentMember,[organization].[h].[store],SELF),{IIF([time].[h].CurrentMember.Level.Name<>"(all)",[Time].[h].CurrentMember,time_set)}),[store_status].[h].CurrentMember),[Measures].[total_sample]>0))', solve_order = 1 MEMBER [measures].[eficiency] AS 'IIF([Measures].[total_sample]>0,1-([Measures].[out_range]/[Measures].[total_sample]),null)', FORMAT_STRING = '#.00%' + IIF([measures].[eficiency]<.5,'|style=olapRptRedCell','') MEMBER [measures].[min_temp] AS 'IIF([measures].[store_count]>0,[measures].[min]/[measures].[store_count],0)', FORMAT_STRING = '#.00' MEMBER [measures].[max_temp] AS 'IIF([measures].[store_count]>0,[measures].[max]/[measures].[store_count],0)', FORMAT_STRING = '#.00' MEMBER [measures].[std_deviation] AS 'IIF([measures].[store_count]>0,[measures].[std_dev]/[measures].[store_count],0)', FORMAT_STRING = '#.00'
MEMBER [measures].[dt_time_params] AS 'IIF([time].[h].CurrentMember.Level.Name<>"(all)" AND [organization].[h].CurrentMember.Level.Name = "store",IIF([time].[h].CurrentMember.Level.Name="date",[time].[h].CurrentMember.Name,[time].[h].CurrentMember.UniqueName),null)' --MEMBER [measures].[dt_org_params] AS 'IIF([time].[h].CurrentMember.Level.Name<>"(all)" AND [organization].[h].CurrentMember.Level.Name = "store",[organization].[h].CurrentMember.UniqueName,null)'
SELECT { --CROSSJOIN({[op_plc_sensor]},{[measures].[store_count]}), CROSSJOIN({temps_set},{temps_mtrx_set}), CROSSJOIN({doors_set},{[measures].[eficiency]}), CROSSJOIN({[op_plc_sensor]},{[measures].[dt_time_params]}) }ON COLUMNS,{ CROSSJOIN( {NONEMPTYCROSSJOIN( {DESCENDANTS({org_set},_param_4_,SELF_AND_BEFORE)} ,{_param_5_})} ,{_param_6_}) }ON ROWS FROM [op_plc_data]
